data.comment: The match is underway in Elche.
Throw-in for Elche in the half of Real Madrid.
In the minute 1, Real Madrid needs to be cautious. Elche have an attacking throw-in.
Throw-in Real Madrid.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Elche.
In the minute 3, Real Madrid attack but Toni Kroos's header doesn't find the target.
Jorge Figueroa Vazquez awards Elche a goal kick.
In Elche, Real Madrid push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
In the minute 6, Throw-in for Elche at Estadio Martínez Valero.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Elche awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 10, Elche's Emiliano Rigoni is on target but unsuccessful.
Corner awarded to Elche.
Free kick for Real Madrid in their own half.
In the minute 11, Ball safe as Elche is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Can Real Madrid get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Elche's half?
Real Madrid to take a throw-in in Elche territory.
In the minute 13, Real Madrid push upfield but Jorge Figueroa Vazquez quickly pulls them for offside.
Marcelo (Real Madrid) shoots – and rattles the crossbar!
Real Madrid drive upfield and Marcelo gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Elche defender.
In the minute 18, Free kick Elche.
Real Madrid apply pressure at Estadio Martínez Valero and a brilliant scoring opportunity is created for Marco Asensio but the strike hits the bar!
Real Madrid take a 0-1 lead thanks to Luka Modric.
In the minute 21, Free kick for Elche in the half of Real Madrid.
Sergio Ramos (Real Madrid) has received a yellow card from Jorge Figueroa Vazquez.
Jorge Figueroa Vazquez awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 23, Jorge Figueroa Vazquez signals a free kick to Real Madrid.
At Estadio Martínez Valero, Real Madrid are penalized for being offside.
In Elche a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 28, Jorge Figueroa Vazquez signals a Real Madrid throw-in in Elche's half.
Throw-in for Elche in their own half.
Lucas Vazquez (Real Madrid) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 29, Real Madrid have been awarded a corner by Jorge Figueroa Vazquez.
Real Madrid awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Real Madrid surge into the attack at Estadio Martínez Valero but Karim Benzema’s header is off-target.
In the minute 31, Goal kick for Elche at Estadio Martínez Valero.
Jorge Figueroa Vazquez signals a free kick to Elche in their own half.
Jorge Figueroa Vazquez signals a free kick to Elche in their own half.
In the minute 34, Elche awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Real Madrid at Estadio Martínez Valero.
Ball safe as Elche is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 39, Throw-in Elche.
Throw-in for Real Madrid in their own half.
Can Elche capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Real Madrid's half?
In the minute 41, Important block from the Real Madrid defence as Emiliano Rigoni fires in a strike for Elche.
Jorge Figueroa Vazquez signals a free kick to Real Madrid.
Elche have a goal kick.
In the minute 45, At Estadio Martínez Valero the fourth official shows that 1 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
Free kick for Elche in their own half.
Jorge Figueroa Vazquez blows to end the first-half.
In the minute 46, The second-half is underway in Elche.
Jorge Figueroa Vazquez awards the home team a throw-in.
Can Real Madrid get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Elche's half?
In the minute 48, Throw-in for Elche in the half of Real Madrid.
Real Madrid awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Jorge Figueroa Vazquez signals a throw-in for Elche, close to Real Madrid's area.
In the minute 49, Free kick Elche.
Free kick in a good position for Elche!
An attacking Elche player has been brought down in the area ... It's a penalty!
In the minute 52, Fidel scores from the spot to level the match at 1-1.
Ball goes out of play for a Elche goal kick.
Real Madrid have been awarded a corner by Jorge Figueroa Vazquez.
In the minute 56, Free kick for Elche in their own half.
Jorge Figueroa Vazquez awards Elche a goal kick.
Throw-in for Elche in their own half.
In the minute 58, Throw-in high up the field for Real Madrid in Elche.
Jorge Figueroa Vazquez signals a free kick to Elche in their own half.
Casemiro is booked for the away team.
In the minute 61, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Free kick for Real Madrid in the half of Elche.
Real Madrid's Luka Modric gets in a shot on goal at Estadio Martínez Valero. But the effort is unsuccessful.
In the minute 63, Lucas Boye of Elche gets in a strike, but is off target.
Real Madrid have a goal kick.
Elche awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 66, In Elche a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Real Madrid's Dani Carvajal has been booked in Elche.
Ball safe as Real Madrid is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 69, Elche's Lucas Boye gets his shot away but it misses the target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Elche.
In Elche Real Madrid drive forward through Dani Carvajal. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Throw-in for Real Madrid close to the penalty box.
Sergio Ramos for Real Madrid drives towards goal at Estadio Martínez Valero. But the finish is unsuccessful.
In the minute 71, Free kick for Elche in their own half.
In the minute 71, Toni Kroos for Real Madrid has been booked by Jorge Figueroa Vazquez and receives a first yellow card.
Corner awarded to Elche.
In the minute 73, Real Madrid awarded a free kick in their own half.
At Estadio Martínez Valero, Gonzalo Verdu has been yellow-carded for the home team.
Tete Morente is on a sub for Victor Rodriguez for Elche.
Jorge Almiron is making the team's second substitution at Estadio Martínez Valero with Josan replacing Emiliano Rigoni.
In the minute 75, Ball goes out of play for a Elche goal kick.
Corner awarded to Real Madrid.
Real Madrid have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 77, Real Madrid are in shooting range from this free kick.
Zinedine Zidane (Real Madrid) is making a first substitution, with Eden Hazard replacing Lucas Vazquez.
Federico Valverde is replacing Toni Kroos for Real Madrid at Estadio Martínez Valero.
In the minute 81, Jorge Figueroa Vazquez signals a Real Madrid throw-in in Elche's half.
Elche to take a throw-in in Real Madrid territory.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 82, Goal kick for Real Madrid at Estadio Martínez Valero.
Jorge Figueroa Vazquez awards Elche a goal kick.
Jorge Figueroa Vazquez signals a free kick to Elche in their own half.
In the minute 85, Marco Asensio (Real Madrid) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Elche have a goal kick.
Real Madrid make their third substitution with Vinicius Junior replacing Marco Asensio.
In the minute 87, Guido Carrillo is replacing Lucas Boye for the home team.
Jorge Figueroa Vazquez awards the away team a throw-in.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Elche.
In Elche a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Real Madrid to take a throw-in in Elche territory.
The fourth official's board shows 3 minutes, which will be added to the 2nd half.
Free kick for Elche in their own half.
Real Madrid awarded a free kick in their own half.
Real Madrid will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Elche.
The whistle has gone to end the second half. The match finishes 1-1.
